0.1.9.en: Bugfix added sleep between create snapshot and sending snapshot to Homey. Blink servers has an delay of 5 seconds.

0.2.3.en: Removed changelog from readme and markdown formatting.

0.2.4.en: Amazon api servers required an full hostname and sni.

0.2.5.en: Probaly fix for arm/disarm and changed amazon api host

0.3.0.en: Remove request package and replace with https package. Fixed SSL bug.

1.0.1.en: Add support for Blink Mini camera

1.0.2.en: Blink Mini Camera wrong capture url

1.0.4.en: Removed wifi and battery from Blink Mini

1.0.5.en: Add support for Blink Mini cam
